title: MONOPOLY® Madness
description: Rediscover the property trading game you love in a way you’ve never seen before. Mr. MONOPOLY is looking for a temporary stand-in while he takes vacation! Get ready to engage in a real-time competitive race to see who has what it takes to take Mr. Monopoly's place. In this race, the rules have changed slightly: •No more board! Roam the streets of Monopoly Town to collect money, water, and electricity. •20 NEW playable characters inspired by classic MONOPOLY® tokens. •Discover 4 unique environments. •Play with up to 6 players online or locally. •Get power-ups from the Community Chests! Use them to gain an advantage to win.
notes: The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the game board, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment and are used with permission © 1935, 2021 Hasbro.
